comments:
It used to be possible to properly format a text fragment that was displayed in
the text field of the test execution history form.

Sending \n or \t now doesn't have any impact, making it difficult to read stack
traces.  Here's a sample of how a stack trace appears in the text field:

The text message box was changed to a HTML text viewer to be able to display
html formats. Looks like it doesn't work well for plain text. It is now updated
to distinguish HTML text and use html viewer only if it is truely html.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
